articles.title: ECG can pinpoint hospitalized COVID-19 patients at high risk of mortality - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A simple electrocardiogram (ECG) can pinpoint hospitalized COVID-19 patients at high risk of death who might need intensive management. That's the finding of a study presented at EHRA 2022, a scientific congress of the European Society of Cardiology.

articles.title: Hungarian election wasn’t a fair fight, observers say - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Media bias and murky campaign finance rules favored Prime Minister Viktor Orbán’s government, according to international experts.
articles.content:
BUDAPEST International observers raised concerns Monday about Hungarys general election, saying the electoral conditions had been tilted in favor of Prime Minister Viktor Orbán’s government.
